The '''Halloween Charity Skin Pack''', also referred to as '''Halloween Skin Pack''',<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20121126203034/http://playxbla.com/minecrafting-for-a-cause/|title=Minecrafting for a Cause – Over $700k Raised Already! Get The Pack Before November 26th Before It’s Too Late!|website=playxbla.com|date=October 24, 2012|author=XBLA_Vulcan}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that contains 55 Halloween-themed skins designed by various indie game developers. It was available exclusively {{in|Xbox 360}} for a limited time between October 26 and November 26, 2012. All proceeds from the skin pack, $770,448 in total,<ref>{{Tweet|4JStudios|278414600276439040|We are delighted to confirm that the Halloween Skin Pack brought in a total of $770,448 for the charities! Thanks everyone :) #MinecraftXBLA}}</ref> were donated to several charities, including {{Wikipedia|Macmillan Cancer Support}}, {{Wikipedia|Child's Play (charity)|Child's Play}}, SANDS Lothians and [[Block by Block]].<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.polygon.com/2012/10/25/3553236/minecraft-xbox-360-getting-55-halloween-costume-skins-tomorrow|title=Minecraft Xbox 360 getting 55 Halloween costume skins tomorrow|website=Polygon|date=October 25, 2012|author=Alexa Ray Corriea}}</ref>

Some skins featured in this skin pack were later re-released as part of the [[Halloween Mash-up]].
